constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 区间内不同元素的频次必须恰好为 K
constraints.formal: ∀ l, r (1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ n), |{a_i | l ≤ i ≤ r, a_i = x}| = k for some x

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 选择的子集必须满足特定条件（即区间内的任务编号频次必须恰好为 K）
constraints.formal: ∀ l, r (1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ n), ∃ x s.t. |{i | l ≤ i ≤ r, a_i = x}| = k
